page.title: 20CLUBS_GIRL GUIDES
page.content: Copmanthorpe has a Brownie pack,a Guide pack and a Scout pack.I used to be in Brownies and I started at the age of seven and I went up to Guides when I was 10 years old.This is a typical evening at a guide meeting. I get there for 7.15pm the Guides start at 7.30pm. Then we are told to get into a horse-shoe shape and we pay our subs which are Â£1 every six weeks. Next we have to get into our group sixes where we can do what we want,for example,we might do some writing and play games in our sixes like "Chinese Whispers". At about 8.15pm we have a game of something like "Snakes and Ladders" or "Fishes" and then we have a sing-song. At 9pm we have "Taps" which is like a prayer which goes.... Day's done,gone the sun from the sky, from the hills. All is well, safely rest,God is nigh.
